Good afternoon,

I'm writing this message with the great understanding that it may not even be read, but I'm going to try

The new rank update in cs go gave me hope for a profound change in the player selection system and a fundamental fix to all ranks, but numerous games with the new update have shown me that the game has not just become unbearable, but horrible.

The problem is that literally every game I'm up against serious ranks that I still have a long way to go (I provide screenshots). If such problems in the previous version of cs go were rare, now it happens literally every game.

This ruins all my impressions of the game and I literally do not want to go into it anymore, in destroyed not only the fundamental balance of the game, but the very essence of competition game
